overview_of_class:
This course is design to provide students with an opportunity to continue their pursuit of the classical ballet technique. It is a technique class with barre and center work. This class will have an emphasis on technical development, extended movement combinations and phrases, including the integration of a broader vocabulary (than the one given on Ballet I), adding more concepts of dynamics, attack, musicality, alignment, lines, use of space and artistry. This course will be challenging to the students both physically and intellectually.

Students must have taken ballet I prior to this course, and/or have had previous Ballet training
name: Ballet II
subject: DANCE
